titles.title: Strengthen Thyselves o Daughters of Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Strengthen thyselves, oh daughters of Zion,
Put on thy zeal as a garment.
Strengthen thyselves, oh sons of the most High,
Put on thy zeal as a mantle.
CHORUS
Strengthen thyselves in thy God,
Lift up the hands that are weak,
Strengthen thyselves,
Oh strengthen thyselves in thy God.
The Lord thy God does turn kings' hearts unto thee,
To strengthen thy hands â€“
to build up the house.
Just as it was with the prophets of old,
They now speak to the house,
to strengthen your hearts.
Wait on the Lord, be of good courage,
And He shall strengthen your heart.
Be of good courage, all that hope in the Lord,
And He shall strengthen your heart.
